lenya:header.lenya:abstract: Abstract that can be used on an overview page

body.subtitle: The subtitle element is optional.
body.p: This is a page using the simple document doctype which describes the elements of this doctype.
There can be a lot of standard text paragraphs (p) in a document.
A Headline 2 is inserted to structure the text and to make it better readable.
Different text styles as bold or italic ("emphasize") can be used as well.
Of course, there are also links that can be set, e.g. to the website of a very promising content management system: Apache Lenya

media.caption: Images can be placed between paragraphs, lists, tables, etc. They can be uploaded by clicking on one of the red dots.

row.entry: Every row is divided into several cells (element "entry").
Text styles as bold and italic can also be used in tables.

body.p: Paragraphs, headlines 2, tables, itemized lists, and images are all on the same level and can be mixed at will.

itemizedlist.listitem: It is composed of several list items (listitem).
